issue.title: missing casts/C-style casts used in iostreams

discussion.p: 27.7.2.2, p1 uses a C-style cast rather than the more appropriate const_cast<> in the Returns clause for basic_istringstream<>::rdbuf(). The same C-style cast is being used in 27.7.3.2, p1, D.7.2.2, p1, and D.7.3.2, p1, and perhaps elsewhere. 27.7.6, p1 and D.7.2.2, p1 are missing the cast altogether.
C-style casts have not been deprecated, so the first part of this issue is stylistic rather than a matter of correctness.
